text: This consultation should encompass the risk of FST abandonment if there are positive margins or LN involvement and oncologic and obstetric risks related to this type of management.FST should not be recommended for rare histological subtypes of cervical cancer including neuroendocrine carcinomas and non-HPV-related adenocarcinomas (except for adenoid basal carcinoma), which tend to exhibit aggressive behavior.
